short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension will help you to track the ripple (XRP) price and notify whenever you want.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This is the most efficient Ripple price tracker to use.
With a layout clean, you will be aware of all the changes in the price of this coin.

P.S.: This plugin uses coinmarketcap API
